data.text:
VP OF SALES - SOFTWARE SOLUTIONS

EXECUTIVE PROFILE

High-performance executive with success in maximizing corporate performance, driving growth, generating revenues, capturing market share, improving profits and enhancing value in domestic and worldwide markets.

Recognized for ability to motivate, mentor and lead high-performance teams through focus, execution and accountability tenets.

Overcame complex business challenges and made high-stakes decisions within fast-paced, high-pressure environments using experience-backed judgment, innovation, strong work ethic, and irreproachable integrity.

Decision-maker in high-level operational initiatives, infrastructure design, process reengineering, turnaround, change, reorganization, and business / product integration for newly acquired companies.

INFOR Global Solutions 2006 ¡V 12/2008

Largest private software company with revenues of $2.3B specializes in enterprise software.

SVP, Strategic Solutions Group / Worldwide GM Public Sector

Appointed to develop, grow and define the Strategic Solutions Group which was comprised of Infor¡¦s new organic growth offerings and marketplaces. The Division was comprised of solutions for EAM, SCM, CRM, HCM, and Worldwide Public Service. Received Chairman¡¦s Award as top executive worldwide.

« Improved Group focus, execution and accountability, and drove revenue growth to $71M through successful implementation of Quarterly Business Reviews at all levels after appointment to motivate, manage and execute overall budget of $250M consisting of software, services and maintenance revenue.

« As member of Infor¡¦s Executive Leadership Team, provided executive input that resulted in defining and refining corporate strategy with global perspective, working with CEO, CFO and Senior Vice Presidents in assessing business unit strategic plans and developing corporate view on portfolio wide gaps and opportunities including acquisition targets.

« Achieved revenue targets within three months of SSG formation, and directly responsible for closing four of the largest software transactions on behalf of Infor Worldwide, accounting for largest number of new customers within Infor Global Solutions.

« Reduced voluntary headcount 9.5%, communicating strong message of company commitment, and executing strategic sales operating plan for multiple newly acquired companies, including Workbrain (HCM), Epiphany (CRM), DataStream (EAM), EXE Technologies (SCE) and Hansen Technologies.

« Managed financial turnaround of Public Sector Division by 118% through successful implementation of comprehensive restructuring plan. Achieved 100% Quota Club Award.

« Increased overall revenue and EBITDA contribution with annual sales of $71M, providing major support and leadership in returning division to profitability, and establishing leading market position.

« Led successful integration of Hansen Technologies acquisition, ensured continuity, drove complete change in go-to market strategy, and executed formal tracking on acquisition¡¦s performance.
